meaning.source_meaning: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.
meaning.translated_meaning: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.

txt.content: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.

meaning.source_meaning: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Your session on website is expired.
meaning.translated_meaning: You session on website is expired.

txt.content: You session on website is expired.

meaning.source_meaning: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.
meaning.translated_meaning: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.

txt.content: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.

meaning.source_meaning: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.
meaning.translated_meaning: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.

txt.content: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.

meaning.source_meaning: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.
meaning.translated_meaning: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.

txt.content: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.

meaning.source_meaning: Communicating round results to host. Please wait.
meaning.translated_meaning: Communicating round results to host. Please wait.

txt.content: Communicating round results to host. Please wait.

meaning.source_meaning: An error occurred while opening the room.
meaning.translated_meaning: An error occurred while opening the room.

txt.content: An error occurred while opening the room.

meaning.source_meaning: .Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

txt.content: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient Balance.Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

txt.content: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

meaning.source_meaning: Balance could not support current bet. You have not been entered into this round.
meaning.translated_meaning: Balance could not support current bet. You have not been entered into this round.

txt.content: Balance could not support current bet. You have not been entered into this round.

meaning.source_meaning: Unfortunately, you were too late and the crash occurred first.
meaning.translated_meaning: Unfortunately, you were too late and the crash occurred first.

txt.content: Unfortunately, you were too late and the crash occurred first.

meaning.source_meaning: Failed to place bet, please try again.
meaning.translated_meaning: Failed to place bet, please try again.

txt.content: Failed to place bet, please try again.

meaning.source_meaning: Failed to place bid, please try again.
meaning.translated_meaning: Failed to place bid, please try again.

txt.content: Failed to place bid, please try again.

meaning.source_meaning: The time to place your bet has passed. Please wait until rocket launch, and place your bets for the next round.
meaning.translated_meaning: The time to place your bet has passed. Please wait until rocket launch, and place your bets for the next round.

txt.content: The time to place your bet has passed. Please wait until rocket launch, and place your bets for the next round.

meaning.source_meaning: You have active bets. After leaving the room, you will remain in the rocket until it crashes or the Auto-Cashout value is reached. Do you want to leave the room?
meaning.translated_meaning: You have active bets. After leaving the room, you will remain in the rocket until it crashes or the Auto-Cashout value is reached. Do you want to leave the room?

txt.content: You have active bets. After leaving the room, you will remain in the rocket until it crashes or the Auto-Cashout value is reached. Do you want to leave the room?

meaning.source_meaning: TRIPLE CASH OR CRASH | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX
meaning.translated_meaning: TRIPLE CASH OR CRASH | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX

txt.content: TRIPLE CASH OR CRASH | ROOM /ROOM_ID/ / ROUND ID: /ROUND_ID/

meaning.source_meaning: TRIPLE MAX BLAST | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX
meaning.translated_meaning: TRIPLE MAX BLAST | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX

txt.content: TRIPLE MAX BLAST | ROOM /ROOM_ID/ / ROUND ID: /ROUND_ID/

meaning.source_meaning: No more bets, round is beginning
meaning.translated_meaning: No more bets, round is beginning

txt.content: No more bets, round is beginning

meaning.source_meaning: Round may finish before connection resumes.
meaning.translated_meaning: Round may finish before connection resumes.

txt.content: Round may finish before connection resumes.

meaning.source_meaning: You have been kicked out of the round by the host
meaning.translated_meaning: You have been kicked out of the round by the host

txt.content: You have been kicked out of the round by the host

meaning.source_meaning: Round already started. Please wait for next round
meaning.translated_meaning: Round already started. Please wait for next round

txt.content: Round already started. Please wait for next round

meaning.source_meaning: Your were idle for too long. Rejoin?
meaning.translated_meaning: Your were idle for too long. Rejoin?

txt.content: Your were idle for too long. Rejoin?

meaning.source_meaning: Your bid has been returned to you
meaning.translated_meaning: Your bid has been returned to you

txt.content: Your bid has been returned to you

meaning.source_meaning: Refund is buy-in minus Prize Multiplier XX
meaning.translated_meaning: Refund is buy-in minus Prize Multiplier XX

txt.content: Refund is buy-in minus Prize Multiplier /VALUE/

meaning.source_meaning: MAX BLAST CHAMPS | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX
meaning.translated_meaning: MAX BLAST CHAMPS | ROOM XX / ROUND ID: XX

txt.content: MAX BLAST CHAMPS | ROOM /ROOM_ID/ / ROUND ID: /ROUND_ID/

meaning.source_meaning: Room owner closed or removed the room
meaning.translated_meaning: Room owner closed or removed the room

txt.content: Room owner closed or removed the room
